title: The transformation of lepidocrocite (Î³-FeOOH) with Fe(II)(aq) in slightly acidic media: intermediate pathways and biomimetic behavior
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00670D, Paper
Mario Alberto Gomez, Yiwen Chen, Miao Song, Dongsheng Li, Alan Scott Lea, Shuhua Yao, Yihang Duan, Yongfeng Jia, Yige Cai, Tangfu Xiao
Lepidocrocite catalysis with Fe(II)(aq) was found to produce Christmas tree particles formed via a bacterial-like mechanism guided by inorganic nanowire antennas through an electron transparent film.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
